events.title: Anne is given a diary on her 13th birthday

movie.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
movie.plot: In Nazi-occupied Holland in World War II, shopkeeper Kraler hides two Jewish families in his attic. Young Anne Frank keeps a diary of everyday life for the Franks and the Van Daans, chronicling the Nazi threat as well as family dynamics. A romance with Peter Van Daan causes jealousy between Anne and her sister, Margot. Otto Frank returns to the attic many years after the eventual capture of both families and finds his late daughter's diary.

events.title: Anne is given a diary on her 13th birthday

movie.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
movie.plot: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 nominations.

events.title: Anne is given a diary on her 13th birthday

movie.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
movie.plot: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.

events.title: the Supreme Court rules that interracial marriage is legal

movie.title: Loving
movie.plot: The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, a couple whose arrest for interracial marriage in 1960s Virginia began a legal battle that would end with the Supreme Court's historic 1967 decision.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 85 nominations.

movie.title: Lovelace
movie.plot: The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband before taking control of her life.

events.title: Nicole Simpson is murdered outside her home

movie.title: The Murder of Nicole Brown Simpson
movie.plot: Inspired by true events, the film follows OJ Simpson's ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson in the last days before her tragic death on June 12th 1994, as seen from her point of view.

movie.title: The Balkan Line
movie.plot: After the NATO bombing of Yugoslavia in 1999, the Yugoslav army pulls out of Kosovo region, leaving Serbian people at the mercy of the Albanian UCK terrorists. A small band of soldiers must take over the Slatina airport, and hold it until the Russian peacekeepers arrive.

events.title: Burke sends a group of colonists to check out a crashed alien spaceship

movie.title: Aliens
movie.plot: Fifty seven years after Ellen Ripley survived her disastrous ordeal, her escape vessel is recovered after drifting across the galaxy as she slept in cryogenic stasis. Back on Earth, nobody believed her story about the "Aliens" on the moon LV-426. After the "Company" orders the colony on LV-426 to investigate, however, all communication with the colony is lost. The Company enlists Ripley to aid a team of tough, rugged space marines on a rescue mission to the now partially terraformed moon to find out if there are aliens or survivors. As the mission unfolds, Ripley will be forced to come to grips with her worst nightmare, but even as she does, she finds that the worst is yet to come.
